name: modernly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way or style that is modern: The farms are modernly equipped with the latest technology. The best rooms are decorated modernly, and always with a simple elegance.
More examplesFewer examplesThe hotel offers modernly furnished rooms and an excellent restaurant.The restaurant is decorated with dark wood and modernly elegant chandeliers.You can use butter or, more modernly, olive oil in place of lard.She looked modernly hip in jeans and a red velvet jacket.Our country needs the most modernly equipped armed forces.
